books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: The Delaney siblings suspect their father of causing the disappearance of their mother.
books.name: APPLES NEVER FALL

books.author: by James Patterson and Nancy Allen
books.description: A young lawyer winds up in an Alabama jail that remains mysteriously crowded.
books.name: THE JAILHOUSE LAWYER

books.author: by Craig Johnson
books.description: The 17th book in the Longmire Mystery series. A player on the Lame Deer Lady Stars High School basketball team receives threats.
books.name: DAUGHTER OF THE MORNING STAR

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: Anthony Cook, an autocratic president, distrusts Mitch Rapp, who is working to uncover a traitor.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: ENEMY AT THE GATES

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: Ray Carney, a family man who sells furniture on 125th Street, gets a new clientele made up of vicious and unsavory characters.
books.name: HARLEM SHUFFLE

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A killer for hire who only takes out bad guys seeks redemption as he does one final job.
books.name: BILLY SUMMERS

books.author: by TJ Klune
books.description: When given seven days to cross over, Wallace tries to pack in a lifetime’s worth of living in that week.
books.name: UNDER THE WHISPERING DOOR

books.author: by Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.name: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.author: by Sally Rooney
books.description: A novelist, a warehouse worker, an editorial assistant and a political adviser deal with changes.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL WORLD, WHERE ARE YOU

books.author: by Richard Powers
books.description: An astrobiologist and single father learns of a neurofeedback treatment that may improve his son’s emotional control.
books.name: BEWILDERMENT

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: Three women come under scrutiny when a young man is found gruesomely murdered in a London houseboat.
books.name: A SLOW FIRE BURNING

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
